item.title: FRRouting Install Guide
item.description: I haven’t posted anything for a long time. I’m still learning some BGP Knowledge and was trying to use bird1 to make BGP Session with another operator. But I can not make BGP Session Establishment with a operator, so I uninstall bird1 and install FRRouting What’s FRRouting? FRRouting is a routing daemon fork from Quagga, has a lot of features (The commands look like Cisco or Arista :D) User Guide: https://docs.
